attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that Sir Fred Goodwin has unfairly benefited from his former position as chief executive of Royal Bank of Scotland. A man who has brought that institution to its knees should not receive a £650,000.00 a year pension. 

We would like to see a annual tax of £645,283.59 levied upon him, which would leave him with £90.70 per week, the same as a basic state pension.
